original: aom h'um / de'i sgrub @151b thabs ni /
analyzed: aom h'um / de'i sgrub @151b thabs ni /

original: lha'i gnas su stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas /
analyzed: lha'i gnas su stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas /
translated: In the abode of the gods, by reciting [the mantra] eight thousand times,

original: de nas mtshan phyed na rkang gdub kyi sgra dang bcas pas 'ong ste lha'i 'dod yon thams cad ster ba dang / de dang bcas pa'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas mtshan phyed na rkang gdub kyi sgra dang bcas pas 'ong ste lha'i 'dod yon thams cad ster ba dang / de dang bcas pa'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then at midnight, she comes with the sound of anklets, bestowing all divine enjoyments, and one will live for a thousand years together with her.

original: de gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas kyang aa pa tsha ra bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas kyang aa pa tsha ra bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Following after her, one should also accomplish ApasarƒÅ.

original: lag pa gnyis padma'i phyag rgya bca' ba ni /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis padma'i phyag rgya bca' ba ni /
translated: The mudra of the two hands is the lotus mudra.

original: aa pa tsha ri'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: aa pa tsha ri'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the pledge mudra of ApasarƒÅ.

original: aa pa tsha ri'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: aa pa tsha ri'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sadhana of ApasarƒÅ is complete.
